alert.note: Alert for Miller; Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 03 at 12:15AM CDT until August 03 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Miller County in central Missouri... East Central Morgan County in central Missouri... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 1215 AM CDT, Emergency management reported flash flooding in Eldon. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. This includes the following low water crossings... Saline Creek at Square Line Road. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
